casebody.data:
RJR NABISCO INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
The EUROPEAN COMMUNITY, et al. No. 15-138. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 1, 2015.

Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit granted.

Justice SOTOMAYOR took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
